name: nuclide-format-js
description: A collection of codemods to help auto format javascript

scripts.build: yarn run clean && babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.watch: yarn run clean && babel src --out-dir lib --watch

useAsService.title: Use with Nuclide
useAsService.description: Allow Nuclide to provide different `cmd-shift-i` command using Language Server Protocol.

runOnSave.title: Run on save
runOnSave.description: This setting is not recommended yet. Instead use the default keyboard shortcut, `cmd-shift-i`.

saveAfterRun.title: Save after run
saveAfterRun.description: Save any changes the transform makes after it has run.

builtIns.title: Built-ins
builtIns.description: Requires will not be added for identifiers in this list.

builtInTypes.title: Built-in Types
builtInTypes.description: Type imports will not be added for identifiers in this list.

aliases.title: Aliases
aliases.description: This is used to specify common aliases that you use. Each pair of entries should be in the format "variableName, moduleName".

confirmNoChangeSuccess.title: Confirm success
confirmNoChangeSuccess.description: Show a brief notification when the transform led to no changes.

moveCursorToSyntaxError.title: Move cursor to error
moveCursorToSyntaxError.description: Place the cursor at the location of the syntax error when the transform fails.

nuclideFixHeader.title: Nuclide: Fix Header
nuclideFixHeader.description: This is used to fix the header when developing on Nuclide source code. This should rarely affect anything outside of Nuclide source.

jsxNonReactNames.title: React: Ignored JSX Tags
jsxNonReactNames.description: These tags or namespaces do not require React to be required.

jsxSuffix.title: React: Add module name suffix
jsxSuffix.description: Attach the `.react` suffix to React component module names.
